definition: to sustain injuries/wounded (in an accident etc)/harmed
to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)

sentences.english: No others were injured in the incident, police said.
sentences.chinese: 在这个枪击事件中没有人受伤，警方说。

sentences.english: With their help, all the apples were picked and put back on the cart.
sentences.chinese: 侥幸的是，苏和汽车司机都没受伤。

sentences.english: Has the purple devoted to encourage and comfort can only temporarily soothe her injured heart.
sentences.chinese: 曾紫陌的鼓励和安慰也只能暂时稍稍安抚她受伤的心。

sentences.english: We will take good care and properly protect the patients vulnerable.
sentences.chinese: 并且对于易受伤害患者予以优先照顾和妥善保护。

sentences.english: They said I looked like only injured the cat quiet, blissful silence only to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 她们说我象只安静受伤的猫，不言不语只睡觉。

sentences.english: Most of the injured were women and children.
sentences.chinese: 大多数受伤者都是妇女和儿童。

sentences.english: Don't dip you wounded hand into the water.
sentences.chinese: 不要把你受伤的手浸到水里。

sentences.english: I know, I truelly known that, my self-esteem is strong, that might hurt you. But, I dont mean to.
sentences.chinese: 我也害怕受伤，但是我还是会为自己喜欢的人付出。

sentences.english: And we're a delicate species, with a long list of wants.
sentences.chinese: 我们是一种易受伤害的种类，有着一系列的需求。

sentences.english: The injured man levered himself up on his elbow.
sentences.chinese: 受伤者靠肘部费劲地抬起身子。

sentences.english: They've been in a very terrible trolley car wrack .
sentences.chinese: 他们在一场严重的电车事故中受伤。

sentences.english: Zheng Tao was later taken to a local hospital with a jaw injury.
sentences.chinese: 随后张涛因下颌受伤而被送进了医院。

sentences.english: Six are said to have been killed, and 11 wounded.
sentences.chinese: 据说，已有六个人丧生，11人受伤。

sentences.english: However, Nani will miss Portugal's trip to Liechtenstein after sustaining a shoulder injury.
sentences.chinese: 不过纳尼因为肩膀受伤不能去国家队报到了。

sentences.english: and the ground is really soft, so that you don't end up hurting your joints.
sentences.chinese: 土地也很柔软，这样你的关节就不会受伤了。

definition: to injure oneself in a fall
to be wounded/to sustain an injury
to abrade/to scrape/to chafe/to graze/abrasion/friction burn/scratch
to suffer a fracture/(of a bone) to break/fracture
to fall down/to slip and fall/to throw sb to the ground
